snippet: Lawmakers voted Thursday to issue posthumous pardons to nine black teenagers who were wrongly convicted of raping two white women more than 80 years ago based on false accusations.
abstract: Alabama lawmakers vote to issue posthumous pardons to nine black teenagers, known as the Scottsboro Boys, who were wrongly convicted of raping two white women more than 80 years ago based on false accusations.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers voted Thursday to issue posthumous pardons to nine black teenagers who were wrongly convicted of raping two white women more than 80 years ago based on false accusations.

headline.main: Alabama: Bill Pardoning Scottsboro Boys Passes
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Bill Pardoning Scottsboro Boys Passes
